title: Can cheap earbuds still deliver? - OnePlus Nord Buds 2
description: Looking for your next tech upgrade? Check out Newegg at   James has tried a lot of higher end earbuds, but sometimes it's nice to go back to basics and see what you can get on a more limited budget. Luckily, OnePlus is here with their new OnePlus Nord Buds 2 that shed some of the features from their OnePlus Buds Pro 2 counterparts while hopefully maintaining enough to be a compelling product.  Check out the OnePlus Nord Buds 2:  Buy OnePlus Buds Pro 2:  Buy Bose QuietComfort Buds 2:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 AirPods are expensive 0:18 Unboxing 0:52 Build quality and design impressions 2:59 Audio quality impressions and Labs' results 6:00 Sponsor - Newegg 6:32 App walkthrough and EQ/Control options 10:09 Fit and battery life 11:18 Mic quality testing 12:20 ANC and overall thoughts 13:02 Outro
